name: @kirick/redis-client
description: Enhanced redis client for Node.js built on top of "redis" package.

scripts.create-commands: bun run redis-up && bun run tools/create-commands.js
scripts.test: bun run create-commands && npm run test-node && bun test
scripts.coverage: bun run redis-up && bun run create-commands && bun test --coverage
scripts.build: bun run create-commands && bun run build-cjs
scripts.npm-publish: bun run build && bunx eslint . && bun run test && npm publish --tag beta; bun run redis-down
scripts.redis-up: docker ps | grep testredis_redis-client >/dev/null || docker run --rm -d -p 49145:6379 --name testredis_redis-client redis:7-alpine

author: Daniil Kirichenko (https://twitter.com/kirickme)
